strategyDescriptions.lump-sum: Invest the entire amount at the start date and hold. Simple buy-and-hold strategy.
strategyDescriptions.dca: Invest a fixed amount at regular intervals (daily, weekly, or monthly), regardless of price. Reduces the impact of volatility.
strategyDescriptions.rsi-dca: Weekly DCA with increased purchases when RSI indicates oversold conditions. Skips buying when overbought.
strategyDescriptions.dip-buyer-dca: Weekly DCA with increased purchases when price drops significantly from recent highs. Buy the dip strategy.
strategyDescriptions.moving-average-dca: Weekly DCA with increased purchases when price is below the moving average. Trend-following strategy.
strategyDescriptions.combined-smart-dca: Combines RSI, Moving Average, and Dip Buyer signals to adjust weekly DCA purchases. Most sophisticated strategy.
